extendedInfo.description: âThis game is the reason I no longer have friends. And itâs worth it! So fun!â (Markad11, Canada)Start out as a young regent of a single city, and go on to build an unbeatable kingdom! Dominate the battlefields, pillage enemy cities. And form a mighty alliance as you compete with thousands of other Players on a gigantic map to answer one question: Who will be the King of Kings? Prove your cunning and bravery in THRONE WARS, the brand new medieval building game.===== More User reviews =====âVery fun game.â (gankmobile, Canada)âvery addictiveâ (Nico250595, Ireland)âFantastic! Only game I playâ (17373gghdd, Canada)===== What you do =====â Gather your friends into a powerful Clan and dominate the leaderboardâ Grow your city to a formidable economic power â Recruit powerful heroes as generals and governorsâ Build a commanding army to fight against other Playersâ Found new cities and expand across the realmâ Learn to rule the realm in easy to play tutorial missionsâ Raze your neighbors to the ground and plunder their wealthâ Research new technologies, build ever more powerful weaponsâ Play with thousands upon thousands of other Players on a gigantic mapDownload this game for free and start your own kingdom right now!===== Note ===== This game requires an internet connection to play and offers in-app purchases. ===== more about flaregames ===== http://www.flaregames.com â¢ http://facebook.com/flaregames â¢ http://twitter.com/flaregames

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I will assure everyone to have a real good time playing this game..I love it ..so much fun
reviews.author: Eddie Raissi

reviews.title: Tons of fun
reviews.comment: Crisp, clean, smooth, beautiful game that is tons of fun..
reviews.author: Aaron Reckless

reviews.title: Fourms
reviews.comment: Seems you guys have some bugs still to work out. To be expected really, but the startup is a little slow. Quests an whatnot should pay out a little more so you can grow your first day. I\'m on day two an it seems you\'ll need about 3 of constant play jus to run of things. I\'ll leave it at 3* tll forums are fixed or when you get around to putting in a live chat so alliances can recruit. -GenocideDJ
reviews.author: Daniel Smith

reviews.title: Not loading
reviews.comment: Game doesn\'t load past about 75-80 %. Unable to get past starting screen.
reviews.author: Yasin Azan

reviews.title: Hey hey hey...
reviews.comment: Game looks great!  I\'ve only just started but my for my first impressions = 5 Stars:)
reviews.author: Gregory Jones

reviews.title: So sorry
reviews.comment: The game might be great, but it doesn\'t load...just stays in \"loading\" status, closer to finish...but that\'s all. Tried on my SIII phone and on the tablet Sony XPERIA.
reviews.author: Daniel Avram

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: Seems like any wait and build game, but the graphical interface is above par for this genre.
reviews.author: Matthew F

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: I just started playing but I think this game has a lot of potential. I\'ll be playing it for a while
reviews.author: Theo Niessen

reviews.title: Definitely keeps your attention
reviews.comment: I am really getting into the game.. A+++
reviews.author: Evan Granger

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: My only problem with this game is that unless you buy gems, your progress will be unbearably slow.  Overall a good game. It\'s fun to build your kingdom and join alliances.  Playing 2 games on different servers helps offset the slow progression.
reviews.author: Hayley Cobb

reviews.title: The kind of game I\'ve been waiting for.
reviews.comment: Very well polished and built. Gameplay is smooth and addicting. Some issues with alliance not showing etc but the biggest is the price of gems.  I think this game will be a hit. Just hope from time to time the developer would come up with promotion on the gems.  Anyway, 5 stars for this beautiful game.
reviews.author: Shaiful Aizal

reviews.title: Bug
reviews.comment: Can not turn off sound when open this app. I set turn off sound and music but when I exit this app and open again, I can hear bird singing, and some human voice (even sound and music still off in setting) When I completed some upgades, one notify will appeared in the bottom of screen, but at this time, If I did the other acting like touching on the screen, the notify will disapeared and can not get the reward anymore. Please fix it.     I use Android 4.1.2 on Asus Fonepad
reviews.author: Tuan Hung Do

reviews.title: Game
reviews.comment: Its a nice game with good music at the back ground, keep up with the work :D
reviews.author: Anders Teng

reviews.title: Not loading
reviews.comment: Same problem for me.. not starting the game just loads 75% and stays there.. got Samsung S3
reviews.author: Ulla granstr\303\266m

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Seems interesting but def not an original concept,  already getting a little frustrated at not being able to recruit more than one troop at a time.  Also,  you should wait a little before asking for a review,  give people a chance to actually play the game.
reviews.author: Tom Welch

reviews.title: Fun but can\'t find my friends
reviews.comment: I have friends playing but when I try to find d them there is nothing at the coordinates. He finds the same when looking for me.
reviews.author: matt kinmark

reviews.title: Good game!
reviews.comment: Upgrade your castle, manage your resources and build troops to attack/defend. Nice strategy game.
reviews.author: Dennis Wong

reviews.title: Has potential
reviews.comment: Looks to be a truer game. Limited world chat allows for you to mak local friends and enemies.
reviews.author: Thomas Peterson

reviews.title: Nice Game!
reviews.comment: A very fun game to play.
reviews.author: Lawrence Su

reviews.title: Reminds me of Travian
reviews.comment: Game is great and enjoyable, installed it yesterday and was smooth, but today its been lagging and disconnecting every 30 seconds, please do something about it cause I intend to continue playing this game.
reviews.author: Ali Farhat
